subject: Draft and Recruitment (Military)
Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A change in military policy means Caleb Campbell, a safety at Army and a seventh-round draft pick, will not get a chance to play for the Detroit Lions after all.
snippet: A change in military policy means Caleb Campbell, a safety at Army and a seventh-round draft pick, will not get a chance to play for the Detroit Lions after all.
